b73fc7e1-fc1e-4d9f-9ba9-11ea9e3734ab.description: The earner of this badge has the knowledge of Emotional Intelligence (EI) and how EI applies to managing themselves and their teams. The earner has developed practical strategies to consistently demonstrate behaviors associated with Emotional Intelligence. They have the skills to harness the power of positive emotions such as empathy, mindfulness, resilience and self-awareness to develop these behaviors to drive outstanding performance in others.
b73fc7e1-fc1e-4d9f-9ba9-11ea9e3734ab.name: Weatherhead Executive Education: MD Anderson Cancer Center Leadership Institute Emotional Intelligence Certificate

issuer.summary: issued by Case Western Reserve University

badge_template_activities.title: Attend Bridge Analytic and Empathic Thinking: Apply Neuroscience for Better Leadership (Webinar). This online program provides an overview of the role the brain plays in a variety of typical workplace problems.

Attend Leading Teams with Emotional Intelligence. This program examines the team leadership role and teaches the behaviors and strategies of high performing teams. During the session, the participants discuss key challenges and opportunities that emerge when leading collaborative teams and learn the details of the Team Performance Essentials Model.

Attend Coaching Teams to Build Team Emotional Intelligence. This program uses the Team Performance Essentials Model to teach leaders how to coach and improve the collaboration and performance of their team. During the program, participants learn the details of the Team Performance Essentials Model; use an informal assessment tool to evaluate the team's current strengths and weaknesses; and develop an action plan for improving the targeted "fundamentals" and "Team EI Norms".

Attend Building Leadership Capability in Emotional Intelligence. This program takes an in-depth look at the Intentional Change Process, an empirically-proven framework for achieving desired, sustained, behavioral transformation. Participants learn how successful leaders maintain their motivation, high performance, and ability to inspire others to achieve outstanding results.

728a4a66-2860-44d8-88bf-4397c5956971.description: The earner of this badge has the knowledge of Emotional Intelligence (EI) and Social Intelligence (SI) and its twelve associated competencies. The earner has developed practical strategies to consistently demonstrate behaviors associated with Emotional and Social Intelligence. They have the skills to harness the power of positive emotions such as empathy, mindfulness, resilience and self-awareness to develop these behaviors to drive outstanding performance in others.
728a4a66-2860-44d8-88bf-4397c5956971.name: Weatherhead Executive Education: Emotionally Intelligent Leader Certificate

issuer.summary: issued by Case Western Reserve University

badge_template_activities.title: 100% attendance in 4 classes that are a part of the Emotionally Intelligent Leader Certificate including all pre- and post-work.

47d200fa-e4cf-4d9f-932d-78ea05db1317.description: Earners of this badge have knowledge of Emotional and Social Intelligence and its 12 competencies, and can enhance EI and SI in themselves and in others. Earners can facilitate sustained desired change through intentional coaching conversations that employ visioning exercises and the generative impact of positive emotions. Through peer and mentor coaching, they have refined their coaching skills by completing 6 hours of coaching practice. They have earned 90 Board Certified Coaching hours.
47d200fa-e4cf-4d9f-932d-78ea05db1317.name: Weatherhead Executive Education: Weatherhead Coaching Certificate

issuer.summary: issued by Case Western Reserve University

alignments.name: Board Certified Coach
alignments.description: The Board Certified Coach (BCC) credential is a mark of distinction for credential holders and a source of credibility for their clients. A BCC has met professional coaching competency standards established by the Center for Credentialing and Education (CCE). This certificate is credentialed by CCE for 90 Board Certified Coaching hours.

badge_template_activities.title: Attend three prerequisite classes - Introduction to Emotional intelligence, Building Leadership Capability through the Power of Intentional Change and The Coach Approach: Initiating Dialogues for Effective Outcomes. Or alternative to The Coach Approach, attend the class - Change Your Questions, Improve Your Results.

Attend the 4-day capstone program - Coaching for Intentional Development. Participate in all peer and mentor coaching sessions. Complete all reading and assignments. Complete the individual 360 feedback through the Emotional and Social Competency Inventory (ESCI). Complete the assessment of learning style through the Kolb-Boyatzis Learning Style Inventory (LSI).
Complete at least six (6) hours of coaching practice during interim and post-program, and submit a log verifying coaching hours.
Get a passing grade on a multiple choice Weatherhead Coaching Knowledge Exam.

f17e39e3-6998-458a-b35d-41c3ebb31124.description: The earner of this badge has the knowledge of Emotional Intelligence (EI) and Social Intelligence (SI), its twelve associated competencies, and has successfully completed the exercises and personal reflections in every competency. The earner has developed practical strategies to consistently demonstrate behaviors associated with Emotional and Social Intelligence, and has the skills to harness the power of positive emotions to develop these behaviors to drive outstanding performance in others.
f17e39e3-6998-458a-b35d-41c3ebb31124.name: Weatherhead Executive Education: Emotional Intelligence - the Weatherhead Way

issuer.summary: issued by Case Western Reserve University

badge_template_activities.title: Successfully complete 15 Emotional and Social Intelligence modules by watching each module video.
Successfully complete the reflection and journal exercises in the 12 Emotional and Social Intelligence modules.
Create tools and strategies to apply Emotional and Social Intelligence competencies at work and at home.
Achieve a passing score on the final assessment.

89f64efe-7883-4839-8a17-fb93b88c8220.description: Earners of this badge have the critical foundational knowledge and skills of credentialed professional coaches. They can initiate and engage in intentional coaching conversations, and listen deeply to bring out the best in others. Earners have created a personal vision as a coach and understand effective coaching competencies. They can apply adult learning models, assessments and frameworks, and can connect coaching results to client goals. They have earned 30 Board Certified Coaching hours.
89f64efe-7883-4839-8a17-fb93b88c8220.name: Weatherhead Executive Education: Foundations of Coaching Certificate

issuer.summary: issued by Case Western Reserve University

alignments.name: Board Certified Coaching
alignments.description: The Board Certified Coach (BCC) credential is a mark of distinction for credential holders and a source of credibility for their clients. A BCC has met professional coaching competency standards established by the Center for Credentialing and Education (CCE). This certificate is credentialed by CCE for 30 Board Certified Coaching hours.

badge_template_activities.title: 100% attendance in the 4 classes as part of the Foundations of Coaching Certificate. This includes the completion of all pre- and post-coursework within 18 months.
Passing grade in the Foundations of Coaching Knowledge Exam consisting of multiple choice questions.

a75b0187-c585-4d55-a10f-d4d3315cf05e.description: Earners of this badge can lead complex new initiatives, from concept to results through strategic inquiry and critical thinking. They have the skills to manage time, quality, cost, risk and execution of projects, and the ability to mobilize resources to meet project requirements efficiently and effectively. Earners have a tool kit for developing achievable project outcomes, identifying real solutions, exploring plausible alternatives, and creating realistic work plans to drive project results.
a75b0187-c585-4d55-a10f-d4d3315cf05e.name: Weatherhead Executive Education: Project Leadership Certificate

issuer.summary: issued by Case Western Reserve University

badge_template_activities.title: 100% attendance in 4 class days in programs associated with the Project Leadership Certificate. This includes all pre- and post-program work.

52f73f4c-309e-4412-a990-5f13925781bb.description: Earners of this badge have developed interpersonal skills to inspire work through others and manage conflict for greater efficiency. Through experiential workshops, they have practiced and expanded their holistic listening and presentation skills. They have learned how to ask impactful questions, create compelling narratives that inspire and have developed strategic flexibility for successful negotiations. They have the critical competencies needed to drive cohesiveness and engagement in teams.
52f73f4c-309e-4412-a990-5f13925781bb.name: Weatherhead Executive Education: Communication and Professional Skills Certificate

issuer.summary: issued by Case Western Reserve University

badge_template_activities.title: 100% attendance in any 4 classes that are a part of the Communication and Professional Skills Certificate. This includes the completion of all pre- and post-coursework within 18 months.

31b729d3-c12e-480f-b353-abe9d9383184.description: Earners of this badge have the skills, concepts, and new perspectives to enhance their impact as leaders in their organizations. They have knowledge of their leadership strengths, capability to develop a resonant vision and can identify strategies needed to lead with high impact. They are adept at maneuvering the challenges of organizational politics, gender dynamics and have the skills to proactively optimize their own power and influence, and through coaching, help develop other women leaders.
31b729d3-c12e-480f-b353-abe9d9383184.name: Weatherhead Executive Education: Women in Leadership Certificate

issuer.summary: issued by Case Western Reserve University

badge_template_activities.title: 100% attendance in 4 classes in the Women in Leadership Certificate including all relevant pre- and post-work.

5a45f210-32fa-4145-8f1d-2708614ac454.description: Earners of this badge are senior leaders in their organization. They have an understanding of the management principles of Appreciative Inquiry and Emotional Intelligence. They have enhanced self-awareness skills and have the tools to motivate and sustain leadership in others. As adaptive leaders, they inspire teams to identify and reach common goals. Earners can accelerate organizational and community change by drawing on core strengths and making a positive impact as agents of world benefit.
5a45f210-32fa-4145-8f1d-2708614ac454.name: Weatherhead Executive Education: Leadership Deep Dive

issuer.summary: issued by Case Western Reserve University

badge_template_activities.title: 100% attendance at 3 Sessions (9 classes total) as part of the Leadership Deep Dive cohort. Criteria includes the completion of all pre-program and post-program assignments.

Complete 5 professional coaching sessions with a Weatherhead Executive coach, including completing the Emotional and Social Competency Inventory (ESCI), development of a personal vision statement and learning plan.

ac12b2c9-cb35-4d61-a066-eed2ed81f67a.description: Earners of this badge have earned Yellow Belt Certification. They have an understanding of the benefits and implications of Six Sigma Define-Measure-Analyze-Improve-Control (DMAIC) methodology, concepts, and basic process improvement tools. They know basic Lean concepts and can identify and incorporate theses optimal tools to address process and quality challenges, and can recognize the factors necessary for a successful Six Sigma program deployment in the service and healthcare industries.
ac12b2c9-cb35-4d61-a066-eed2ed81f67a.name: Weatherhead Executive Education: Process Improvement: Yellow Belt Certification

issuer.summary: issued by Case Western Reserve University

alignments.name: Six Sigma Yellow Belt
alignments.description: The Council for Six Sigma Certification (CSSC) create a set of standards to help institutions. teach effective and applicable Six Sigma certification courses.

badge_template_activities.title: 100% attendance in 2 days of learning as a part of Weatherhead's Process Improvement: Yellow Belt Training and Certification. This includes all the relevant pre- and post-work.
Yellow Belt Certification will be granted upon a passing grade in a final assessment.

12d7dcad-6849-42d4-853e-aba42c9ce558.description: Growing Entrepreneurship in Transitioning Economies focuses on the various aspects of the entrepreneurial ecosystem and asks students to apply what they are learning by analyzing the impact on the growth of entrepreneurship in a specific region. In this course students from the National University of Management in Cambodia partnered with students at the Weatherhead School of Management to examine these issues and develop proposals to encourage growth in the region.
12d7dcad-6849-42d4-853e-aba42c9ce558.name: Growing Entrepreneurship in Transitioning Economies

issuer.summary: issued by Case Western Reserve University

badge_template_activities.title: Students participated in live class sessions over 14 weeks where they engaged with international speakers to explore the impact of the various components of the entrepreneurial ecosystem.

Working in mixed groups students met with a Cambodian entrepreneur(s) and crafted a presentation interpreting their experience as it relates to governmental, donor and/or private sector efforts to support entrepreneurship in Cambodia.

The final group project for this course provided students an opportunity to draw upon many of the concepts and frameworks that were been covered in the lectures and readings for the course, and use them to produce a project proposal in response to a provided problem of practice.

82011f0e-2ceb-4d59-9c50-93635a46b000.description: Earners of this badge have an expanded skill set in interpersonal management and intermediate knowledge of managing complex projects and ad hoc, cross-functional teams. Earners have either gained practical tools in how to set goals, manage priorities and delegate or have a certification in Six Sigma Define-Measure-Analyze-Improve-Control (DMAIC) methodology, concepts, and process improvement tools. They have earned skills in team building, communication and strategic financial decision making.
82011f0e-2ceb-4d59-9c50-93635a46b000.name: Weatherhead Executive Education: Fundamentals of Management Certificate

issuer.summary: issued by Case Western Reserve University

badge_template_activities.title: 100% attendance in one of the two required classes that are a part of the Fundamentals of Management Certificate. 100% attendance in 2 electives that are a part of the Fundamentals of Management Certificate. This includes completion of all pre- and post-work.

bd62e698-edfc-4a5c-9d83-02d7144ca484.description: This certificate program helps participants achieve their potential at an accelerated rate by bringing together foundational required courses with a series of electives so that each individual can tailor a program to specific strengths and needs. Earners of the badge have developed competencies in the area of Emotional Intelligence, Communication, Leadership, Operational Excellence and Coaching.
bd62e698-edfc-4a5c-9d83-02d7144ca484.name: Weatherhead Executive Education: University Hospitals Leadership in Medical Education

issuer.summary: issued by Case Western Reserve University

badge_template_activities.title: Earners must take 2 required courses and 2 elective courses.

c2743541-5b1f-40b7-90c3-3aa3cdf6a0fc.description: LEAD - Leadership Experiences for Accelerated Development provides focused development experiences to selected global talent in competency and skill areas that are critical to achieving Fortune Brands' strategic initiatives. These high-performing organizational leaders are in key roles required to drive the business strategy forward. LEAD participants have the knowledge and skillsets needed to successfully lead with resonance and emotional intelligence.
c2743541-5b1f-40b7-90c3-3aa3cdf6a0fc.name: Fortune Brands - LEAD

issuer.summary: issued by Case Western Reserve University

badge_template_activities.title: Participation in LEAD is by nomination and includes high-performing organizational leaders who are in key roles required to drive the business strategy forward.
100% attendance at all sessions.
Complete all pre-program and post-program assignments.
Complete 3 professional coaching sessions and a 360 degree assessment with a Weatherhead Executive Coach, including development of Personal Vision Statement and Learning Plan.

ecbd4ec0-198d-4ab1-888c-9e5e4fd674ed.description: Earners of this badge are leaders in the technology industry. They have the skills to make an immediate impact in their organizations. Earners have critical leadership skills with a deep understanding of Emotional and Social Intelligence. They have created a personal leadership vision through executive coaching. Earners have leadership skills in influence, change leadership and strategic thinking to enhance business performance, and can positively influence organizational culture.
ecbd4ec0-198d-4ab1-888c-9e5e4fd674ed.name: Virtusa Leadership Institute for Women in Technology

issuer.summary: issued by Case Western Reserve University

badge_template_activities.title: 100% attendance at 3 Sessions as part of the Virtusa Leadership Institute for Women in Technology. Criteria includes the completion of all pre-program and post-program assignments.
Complete 5 professional coaching sessions with a Weatherhead Executive Coach, including development of Personal Vision Statement and Learning Plan.

b2f47db0-81fd-41b0-92eb-38c2d7db8fd1.description: Earners of this badge can lead with emotional intelligence and communicate collaborative, impactful solutions to energize their organizations. They are grounded in three key areas of management – leadership, communication, and strategy. They are adaptive leaders who can pivot short-term problems to develop strategies for long-term successes. They have the knowledge and the ability to be intentional in strategic communication, to creatively engage resources and to scale client experiences.
b2f47db0-81fd-41b0-92eb-38c2d7db8fd1.name: Weatherhead Executive Education: Leadership and Management Certificate

issuer.summary: issued by Case Western Reserve University

badge_template_activities.title: 100% attendance in 4 classes in the Leadership and Management Certificate. This includes all relevant pre- and post-program work.

83c7ef96-c2b4-4976-91e7-b7604374927a.description: Earners of this badge are leaders in the STEM and Manufacturing industries. They have the skills to make an immediate impact in their organizations. Earners have critical leadership skills with a deep understanding of Emotional and Social Intelligence. They have created a personal leadership vision through executive coaching. Earners have the skills for innovation, decision making and problem solving to enhance business performance, and can positively influence organizational culture.
83c7ef96-c2b4-4976-91e7-b7604374927a.name: Weatherhead Executive Education: Leadership Institute for Women in STEM and Manufacturing

issuer.summary: issued by Case Western Reserve University

badge_template_activities.title: 100% attendance at 3 Sessions (9 classes total) as part of the 2021 Leadership Institute for Women cohort. Criteria includes the completion of all pre-program and post-program assignments.
Complete 3 professional coaching sessions with a Weatherhead Executive coach, including development of Personal Vision Statement and Learning Plan.

1c30502f-120f-4b7a-b613-6078e82c4f27.description: Earners of this badge are adaptive leaders. They can apply the essential leadership skills for gaining focus, maintaining calm and clarity and managing emotions to develop positive results. Earners can demonstrate how mindfulness can be used as a strategic tool for action to create new options and opportunities. They can expand their capacity to identify stakeholders and cultivate relationships to support adaptive change and can integrate mindfulness to face adaptive leadership challenges.
1c30502f-120f-4b7a-b613-6078e82c4f27.name: Weatherhead Executive Education: Mindfulness for Effective Leadership Certificate

issuer.summary: issued by Case Western Reserve University

badge_template_activities.title: 100% attendance in the 3 classes associated with the Mindfulness for Effective Leadership Certificate including successfully completing all the pre- an post-work.

7522ef59-2e9f-49dc-ab81-605286b8852c.description: Individuals that receive this badge have completed four semesters of coursework toward their MBA in Healthcare Management from the Weatherhead School of Management at Case Western Reserve University. Classes completed include leadership development, economics, statistics, corporate finance, and digital innovation in healthcare. Students have developed skills that focus on using data to make informed decisions that can help them drive transformational change in their organizations.
7522ef59-2e9f-49dc-ab81-605286b8852c.name: Halfway to my MBA

issuer.summary: issued by Case Western Reserve University

badge_template_activities.title: Leadership Assessment & Development: In today’s increasingly complex and fast-paced environment, it is essential to know yourself well, to manage yourself well and to be adept at working effectively with a wide range of people. The overarching objectives of this course are to broaden and deepen self-awareness in preperation to be an effective leader and life-long learner.

Probability Statistics & Quantitative Methods helps students acquire and/or refresh the following statistics, mathematics, and computer skills that are essential for success in the core courses of the MBA program:In probability and statistics, the following three primary areas are covered - Descriptive Statistics: summarizing and explaining data.Probability: modeling randomness and variability using probability ideas.Sampling: mean, standard deviation, and the role of the Central Limit Theorem.

Digital Innovation in Healthcare explores the role of digital technology in creating new digitally enabled services in the healthcare sector. Students engage with senior leaders to learn how digital technology is being operationalized in the real world while examining core principles surrounding the identification and implementation of digital innovation.

Accounting for Managers introduces management students to accounting’s role in business administration. Students learn that accounting is not math, truth, or putting numbers into boxes. Instead, students learn that accounting is an imprecise language used to send and receive information about economic performance.

Statistics and Decision Modeling helps students become competent analysts by providing them with the ability to use—and to communicate with those who use—certain quantitative approaches to help make informed decisions for your organizations. A secondary objective is to provide them with the quantitative knowledge and skills that are needed in other MBA courses. The two groups of quantitative techniques are statistics and decision modeling.

Managing People and Organizations: In today’s complex fast-paced environment, it’s critical to be able to optimize organizational performance. All organizations (corporations, non-profits, government) aim to achieve some goal or objective (e.g., increase shareholder value, meet a patient need, provide a service, create value for stakeholders, make a positive social impact). This course is designed to enhance the ability to make well-reasoned decisions about managing people and organizations.

Culture in Healthcare Organizations focuses on organizational culture as it affects health care delivery in large hospital systems. It draws on the expertise and experience of the Cleveland Clinic, MetroHealth, U.H., and VA Hospital to examine factors in organizational culture that can improve (or worsen) intended healthcare outcomes. Each of the 4 institutions has a unique culture. Comparing and contrasting them allows students to understand the “best of each”

Regulatory Issues in Healthcare provides and overview of key areas health law at level important to managers in healthcare related organizations. The topical areas covered include (1) the history, structure, financing, and operation of the U.S. medical system; (2) legal and ethical rules and regulations governing physicians and other health care professionals; the patient-physician relationship; institutional providers of care such as hospitals, nursing homes, and laboratories; and drug and devi

Financial Management introduces students to multiple concepts in Corporate Finance with the aim of providing principles and tools that enable you to make managerial decisions that increase the firm’s value. The course will begin by building a foundation in understand the time value of money and its many applications, and then move on to various tools used to evaluate sound investment decision making.

Economics for Managers offers an introduction to the theories, principles, and applications of microeconomics and macroeconomics. Microeconomics topics include supply and demand, market failures, theory of the firm, market structure, pricing strategies, strategic decision-making, and decision-making under uncertainty. Macroeconomics topics include international trade, business cycles, economic policies, economic growth, and inequality.

2661ea61-c4ef-4a10-ae16-4a6d9b5bba0d.description: The Women Staff Leadership Development Institute (WSLDI) is a year-long eighty-hour program offering women-identified staff an opportunity to enhance and energize leadership and career development skills through education, coaching, and the building of professional networks.
2661ea61-c4ef-4a10-ae16-4a6d9b5bba0d.name: Weatherhead Executive Education: Flora Stone Mather Women Staff Leadership Development Institute Leadership and Management Certificate

issuer.summary: issued by Case Western Reserve University

badge_template_activities.title: The WSLDI Leadership and Management Certificate consist of four programs/courses/seats from the affiliate package.  Introduction to Emotional Intelligence, Leading with Greater Self-Awareness, Team Leadership Through Emotional Intelligence, and Change Leadership.  100% attendance is required.

565349e1-9a2d-4efe-b14f-743c868e1a96.description: This badge signifies the earner has completed the organizational development and transformational change theme in their Healthcare MBA program. This theme consisted of three courses focused on individual leadership and emotional intelligence, managing people and organizations, and culture in healthcare organizations. The culminating capstone for the theme was a series of visits to four major healthcare institutions to examine how culture and leadership styles impact how they operate.
565349e1-9a2d-4efe-b14f-743c868e1a96.name: Transformational Leadership

issuer.summary: issued by Case Western Reserve University

badge_template_activities.title: Leadership Assessment and Development: The objective of the course is to have students learn a method for assessing and developing in themselves the knowledge and abilities relevant to management throughout their careers. This is accomplished by helping students develop an individualized learning plan to enhance their level of knowledge in 11 fields and 22 abilities. Students engage in a number of assessment activities, then receive feedback and interpret it.

Managing People and Organizations: Examines the behavioral sciences relevant to the effective management of people and the effective design of human resources system, structure and policies. Topics include leadership, change management, motivation and pay systems, team dynamics, staffing, decision making, organizational communications, employee participation, performance appraisal, conflict management, negotiation, work design, organizational design, and organizations culture.

Organizational Culture in Healthcare: This course focuses on organizational culture as it affects health care delivery in large hospital systems.During a 3 1/2 day immersive residency students engage with staff at the Cleveland Clinic, MetroHealth Medical Center,University Hospitals, and the Veterans Administration to learn about their unique culture. This allows students to understand the “best of each” and leverage organizational culture as a way to strengthen hospital strategy and operations.

4e32557f-219b-4031-bac0-824ab7621422.description: Earners of this badge have Lean Six Sigma Green Belt Certification. They have knowledge and practical experience of using the DMAIC process, along with critical tools such as regression analysis, chi-squared analysis, 5S, and value stream mapping. They have completed an individual project with two hours of coaching to ensure successful application of their learning. Earners have enhanced problem solving skills and are indispensable in support of an organization's operational excellence.
4e32557f-219b-4031-bac0-824ab7621422.name: Weatherhead Executive Education: Lean Six Sigma Green Belt Certification

issuer.summary: issued by Case Western Reserve University

alignments.name: Lean Six Sigma Green Belt Certification
alignments.description: The Council for Six Sigma Certification (CSSC) create a set of standards to help institutions. teach effective and applicable Six Sigma certification courses.

badge_template_activities.title: 100% attendance in 5 days of learning as a part of Weatherhead's Lean Six Sigma Green Belt Certification. This includes all the relevant pre- and post-work.
Complete an individual field project to apply knowledge into practical application with 2 hours of individual coaching.
Green Belt Certification will be granted upon completion and presentation of an approved process improvement project.

9b7da6ba-b5d5-4c2d-b5f2-895362556734.description: Earners of this badge can lead with emotional intelligence and communicate collaborative, impactful solutions to energize their organizations. They are grounded in three key areas of management – leadership, communication, and strategy. They are adaptive leaders who can pivot short-term problems to develop strategies for long-term successes. They have the knowledge and the ability to be intentional in strategic communication and to creatively engage resources.
9b7da6ba-b5d5-4c2d-b5f2-895362556734.name: Weatherhead Executive Education: Office of Research Administration Certificate of Leadership and Management

issuer.summary: issued by Case Western Reserve University

badge_template_activities.title: The Office of Research Leadership and Management Certificate consists of 2 required courses and 2 elective courses. 100% attendance is required to achieve the certificate and have 18 months to complete the certificate.

e3a18efb-39f0-4789-8e2d-07e7e453716f.description: Individuals who have earned this badge have facilitated an affiliate forum to a group of their peers. Earners understand the value and benefits of the Weatherhead Executive Education program portfolio. They can represent Weatherhead Executive Education to advocate for programs that best meet their organization’s leadership and employee development needs. These individuals are capable of navigating the Affiliate Portal and using available features to manage registrations for their organization.
e3a18efb-39f0-4789-8e2d-07e7e453716f.name: Weatherhead Executive Education: Affiliate Account Expert

issuer.summary: issued by Case Western Reserve University

badge_template_activities.title: Earners of this badge facilitate a monthly Affiliate Forum on a specific topic.
Understand the features and benefits of the Weatherhead Portfolio and ability to navigate the portal.
Advocates for Weatherhead within their organization.
Assists in promoting a custom program within their organization.  (Not a requirement to earn the badge but can be considered alternate criteria instead of facilitating a forum.)

88e5fa8f-4f9a-4c94-9de0-d3b0fb1db48a.description: Earners of this badge have hands-on experience with a strengths-based approach to organizational change by examining real case studies and stories. Through a combination of coursework and fieldwork, and by drawing from their individual field projects and coaching calls, earners have broadened their exposure to multiple AI applications. They can apply and adapt the Appreciative Inquiry Summit Method to a broad range of change management scenarios within and outside their organizations.
88e5fa8f-4f9a-4c94-9de0-d3b0fb1db48a.name: Weatherhead Executive Education: Appreciative Inquiry Certificate in Positive Business and Society Change

issuer.summary: issued by Case Western Reserve University

badge_template_activities.title: 100% attendance in the foundations class - Appreciative Inquiry: Leveraging Strengths for Transformative, Lasting Change. This includes the completion of all pre- and post-coursework.

Conduct three appreciative interviews with social and business change leaders. Active participation in monthly Appreciative Inquiry learning conferences. Prepare a report on inquiries conducted with three leaders in the field and submit an analysis of individual appreciative Inquiry project.
100% attendance in capstone program including the completion of all pre- and post-coursework.

1c0fd113-3dfb-4127-9fd9-5c0ed1f86b49.description: The earner of this badge can evaluate the economic logic to recommend digital transformation in an organization. By successfully auditing and identifying key strategic digital assets and analyzing an organization’s readiness for digital transformation, the earner has the ability to develop new value creation processes and create success metrics for strategic digital innovation.
1c0fd113-3dfb-4127-9fd9-5c0ed1f86b49.name: Weatherhead Executive Education: Digital Transformation-Strategic Tools & Frameworks for Success

issuer.summary: issued by Case Western Reserve University

badge_template_activities.title: Watch 12 online video sessions and review supplemental materials - 3 case studies. Complete related 7 activities through an interactive workbook.
Use the Layered Modular Architecture Framework to examine organization's line of products.
Analyze your organization using the lens of the fundamental shifts to prepare for digital innovations. Develop a New Creation Framework. Apply the 3A Design Model to your digitalization project.
Achieve a passing score on the final assessment.

30e2743f-7e75-4775-b83e-9a4f11f9db47.description: Earners of this badge have taken their leadership skills to the next level by engaging in programs typically found in an MBA program. They have skills in leading with self-awareness and are able to employ a servant leadership attitude to empower and influence. Earners can initiate positive, strengths-based change through appreciative inquiry and are grounded in strategic thinking and strategic decision making, change management and in competitive strategy.
30e2743f-7e75-4775-b83e-9a4f11f9db47.name: Weatherhead Executive Education: Advancing Manager Certificate

issuer.summary: issued by Case Western Reserve University

badge_template_activities.title: 100% attendance in 4 programs associated with the Weatherhead Executive Education Advancing Manager Certificate. This includes all the applicable  pre- and post-work.

75bbfd73-702e-453b-8aaf-6c27fa995f5c.description: The earner of this badge has the knowledge to rapidly rally people in change-resistant institutions. The earner has created a strengths-based road map to success by developing a 100-day change initiative. Through an appreciative mindset, by successfully completing the exercises in each module and by applying the 10 most powerful change management tools in the P.O.S.I.T.I.V.E change platform, the earner has the ability and skill to manage and mobilize positive organizational change.
75bbfd73-702e-453b-8aaf-6c27fa995f5c.name: Weatherhead Executive Education: Change Management with a New Change Equation

issuer.summary: issued by Case Western Reserve University

badge_template_activities.title: Successfully complete 7 modules by watching each module video and completing the activities in each module.
Successfully map stake-holder groups, build up question guides, identify opportunity areas and create an improvised, experiential prototype for a communication and engagement roll out.
Create a 100-day project plan by apply the P.O.S.I.T.I.V.E model to share, teach and engage people in the organization.
Achieve a passing score on the final assessment.

eba4d914-a452-4917-b0da-085ba9c8ee76.description: Earners of this badge can lead with emotional intelligence and communicate collaborative, impactful solutions to energize their organizations. The program is designed to teach participants to think differently about adapting to current professional challenges, enhance leadership actions, and further results. Participants are provided practical tools to ensure team productivity, including specific education on setting goals, managing priorities, and delegating tasks.
eba4d914-a452-4917-b0da-085ba9c8ee76.name: Weatherhead Executive Education: Aviation Leadership Program

issuer.summary: issued by Case Western Reserve University

badge_template_activities.title: 100% attendance during all sessions. Criteria includes the completion of all pre-program and post-program assignments.

f4833fc1-db8b-4a1c-90cf-c0b2643a52c2.description: Earners of this badge are able to define and analyze an organization’s digital assets using the lens of a new value creation framework to prepare for digital innovations. Earners have a foundational understanding of Artificial Intelligence with awareness of the challenges and opportunities of AI integration. They have the ability to develop advanced competitive strategies by leveraging core capabilities, identifying markets and maximizing the full potential of their business into new markets.
f4833fc1-db8b-4a1c-90cf-c0b2643a52c2.name: Weatherhead Executive Education: Designing Innovations that Deliver Value Certificate

issuer.summary: issued by Case Western Reserve University

badge_template_activities.title: 100% attendance in 4 classes in the Designing Innovations that Deliver Value Certificate including all the pre- and post work.

85065bea-1313-4e3e-b32a-b6044cd90528.description: Earners of this badge have an expanded skill set in interpersonal management and intermediate knowledge of managing complex projects and ad hoc, cross-functional teams. Earners have either gained practical tools in how to set goals, manage priorities and delegate or have a certification in Six Sigma Define-Measure-Analyze-Improve-Control (DMAIC) methodology, concepts, and process improvement tools. They have earned skills in team building, communication and strategic financial decision making.
85065bea-1313-4e3e-b32a-b6044cd90528.name: Weatherhead Executive Education: Management Essentials Certificate

issuer.summary: issued by Case Western Reserve University

badge_template_activities.title: 100% attendance in one of the two required classes that are a part of the Management Essentials Certificate. 100% attendance in 2 electives that are a part of the Fundamentals of Management Certificate. This includes completion of all pre- and post-work.

6a4a1043-acb5-40bf-b98c-3768e611915f.description: Earners of this badge have taken their leadership skills to the next level by engaging in programs typically found in an MBA program. They have skills in leading with self-awareness and are able to employ a servant leadership attitude to empower and influence. Earners can initiate positive, strengths-based change through appreciative inquiry and are grounded in strategic thinking and strategic decision making, change management and in competitive strategy.
6a4a1043-acb5-40bf-b98c-3768e611915f.name: Weatherhead Executive Education: Advanced Management Certificate

issuer.summary: issued by Case Western Reserve University

badge_template_activities.title: 100% attendance in 4 programs associated with the Weatherhead Executive Education Advanced Management Certificate. This includes all the applicable pre- and post-work.

fc902747-6bd7-4a65-b77f-1d7ab20f099f.description: Earners of this badge can lead with emotional intelligence and deliver collaborative, impactful solutions to energize their organizations. Grounded in three key areas of management – leadership, communication, and strategy, they are adaptive leaders who can pivot short-term problems to develop strategies for long-term successes. They have the knowledge and the ability to be intentional in strategic communication, to creatively engage resources and to scale client experiences.
fc902747-6bd7-4a65-b77f-1d7ab20f099f.name: Weatherhead Executive Education: Executive Management Certificate

issuer.summary: issued by Case Western Reserve University

badge_template_activities.title: 100% attendance in 4 classes in the Executive Management Certificate. This includes all relevant pre- and post-program work.

c48b4912-fa25-494e-b484-23bfa4c4ca0b.description: The earner of this badge has completed the Global Citizenship Program track of the Civic Engagement Scholars program. The earner has completed both action and education hours in an intercultural or international context. Through this program, the earner has gained the skills to enhance their ability to effectively communicate across cultures and develop a greater understanding of and appreciation for different perspectives and experiences than their own.
c48b4912-fa25-494e-b484-23bfa4c4ca0b.name: Global Citizenship Program

issuer.summary: issued by Case Western Reserve University

badge_template_activities.title: Complete a minimum of 5 action (volunteer) hours working with an international population or practicing intercultural competence Complete a minimum of 5 educational hours in an international or intercultural context

2eb00b1a-8763-49eb-a87b-800c870b418d.description: This certificate program helps participants achieve their potential at an accelerated rate by bringing together foundational required courses with a series of electives so that each individual can tailor a program to specific strengths and needs. Earners of the badge have developed competencies in the area of Emotional Intelligence, Communication, Leadership, Operational Excellence and Coaching.
2eb00b1a-8763-49eb-a87b-800c870b418d.name: Weatherhead Executive Education: MetroHealth Leadership in Medical Education

issuer.summary: issued by Case Western Reserve University

badge_template_activities.title: Earners must take 2 required courses and 2 elective courses.

3be4c3b9-f69b-465b-b54e-572f7db0328d.description: Superior Beverage's Certificate of Operational Excellence was specifically developed for the organization's management team with assistance from the L&D professionals at Weatherhead. Participants who have successfully completed the certificate have increased the necessary skills in the competencies of Appreciative Inquiry, Emotional Intelligence, Strategic & Analytical Thinking, Communication, Process Improvement, Problem Solving, and Business Acumen.
3be4c3b9-f69b-465b-b54e-572f7db0328d.name: Weatherhead Executive Education: Superior Beverage Certificate of Operational Excellence

issuer.summary: issued by Case Western Reserve University

badge_template_activities.title: Earners of this badge must complete 4 required classes and 2 elective classes in the Superior Beverage Certificate of Operational Excellence curriculum.

87d55e38-d3b2-4396-b7ed-200f30c97f05.description: Earners of this badge have developed the vital skills to lead high-performing teams. They can address and navigate the challenges of conflict and continuous change. They lead diverse teams with Emotional Intelligence. As an agile and adaptive leader, they have the developed the resilience, responsiveness and trust required to empower their teams to operate at their highest levels.
87d55e38-d3b2-4396-b7ed-200f30c97f05.name: Weatherhead Executive Education: Team Leadership Certificate

issuer.summary: issued by Case Western Reserve University

badge_template_activities.title: 100% attendance in 4 class days in programs associated with the Team Leadership Certificate. This includes all pre- and post-program work.

2ea5bdd4-ea12-4778-920c-03ce9d8453b9.description: The earner of this badge has the knowledge of Emotional Intelligence (EI) and Social Intelligence (SI) and its twelve associated competencies. The earner has developed practical strategies to consistently demonstrate behaviors associated with Emotional and Social Intelligence. They have the skills to harness the power of positive emotions such as empathy, mindfulness, resilience and self-awareness to develop these behaviors to drive outstanding performance in others.
2ea5bdd4-ea12-4778-920c-03ce9d8453b9.name: Weatherhead Executive Education: Cleveland Clinic Certificate on Emotional Intelligence

issuer.summary: issued by Case Western Reserve University

badge_template_activities.title: 100% attendance in 4 classes that are a part of the Cleveland Clinic Certificate on Emotional Intelligence including all pre- and post-work.

491deca0-f110-43fc-95ac-0c5e2310a52c.description: Earners of this badge have developed interpersonal skills to inspire work through others and manage conflict for greater efficiency. Through experiential workshops, they have practiced and expanded their holistic listening and presentation skills. They have learned how to ask impactful questions, create compelling narratives that inspire and have developed strategic flexibility for successful negotiations. They have the critical competencies needed to drive cohesiveness and engagement in teams.
491deca0-f110-43fc-95ac-0c5e2310a52c.name: Weatherhead Executive Education: Cleveland Clinic Leadership Communication Skills Certificate

issuer.summary: issued by Case Western Reserve University

badge_template_activities.title: 100% attendance in any 4 classes that are a part of the Cleveland Clinic Leadership Communication Skills Certificate. This includes the completion of all pre- and post-coursework within 18 months.

4a07bed4-6cbd-404b-ae89-5b7948203c42.description: The ISK Bioscience Leadership Certificate offers programs that will help the employee navigate the challenges of managing a team while maximizing the output required achieving business objectives. Grounded in three key areas of management – leadership, communication, and strategy, they are adaptive leaders who can pivot short-term problems to develop strategies for long-term successes. The certificate focuses on Emotional and Social Intelligence competencies.
4a07bed4-6cbd-404b-ae89-5b7948203c42.name: Weatherhead Executive Education: ISK Bioscience Leadership Certificate

issuer.summary: issued by Case Western Reserve University

badge_template_activities.title: This certificate is awarded after completion of four programs. Certificate requirements should be completed within a 24 month period. Choose four (4) programs from the sections below. Two are required and two electives from different categories.

a7df3920-9965-48aa-914d-051d15c99c25.description: The Buckeye Corrugated Leadership and Management certificate participants have developed intentional communication skills, have heighten leadership skills, have maximized and engaged resources, and scaled client experience. These professionals have developed the skills to lead in times of change. The Buckeye Corrugated Leadership and Management certificate participants have learned how to engage their Emotional Intelligence while developing their leadership skills.
a7df3920-9965-48aa-914d-051d15c99c25.name: Weatherhead Executive Education: Buckeye Corrugated Leadership and Management Certificate

issuer.summary: issued by Case Western Reserve University

badge_template_activities.title: This certificate is awarded after completion of four programs in The Buckeye Corrugated Leadership and Management Certificate. Certificate requirements should be completed within an 18-month period. 100% attendance is required to achieve this certificate.

1858943d-dc43-4a71-af49-51a213215446.description: The Cleveland Guardians certificate of Leadership focuses the individual to lead with emotional intelligence and communicate collaborative, impactful solutions. They are grounded in three key areas of management – leadership, communication, and strategy. They are adaptive leaders who can pivot short-term problems to develop strategies for long-term successes. They have the knowledge and the ability to be intentional in strategic communication.
1858943d-dc43-4a71-af49-51a213215446.name: Weatherhead Executive Education: Cleveland Guardians Certificate of Leadership

issuer.summary: issued by Case Western Reserve University

badge_template_activities.title: This certificate is awarded after completion of four programs. Certificate requirements should be completed within an 18-month period. One program is required and choose from three electives.

edaa9a4d-260c-48f0-a1f5-c935bfa8e1e3.description: Earners of this badge are able to define and analyze an organization’s digital assets using the lens of a new value creation framework to prepare for digital innovations. Earners have a foundational understanding of Artificial Intelligence with awareness of the challenges and opportunities of AI integration. They have the ability to develop advanced competitive strategies by leveraging core capabilities, identifying markets and maximizing the full potential of their business into new markets.
edaa9a4d-260c-48f0-a1f5-c935bfa8e1e3.name: Weatherhead Executive Education: Innovation and Design

issuer.summary: issued by Case Western Reserve University

badge_template_activities.title: 100% attendance in 4 classes in the Innovation and Design Certificate including all the pre- and post work.
